episode: I was watching an old sitcom and it made me remember the time when I was in high school.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was watching an old sitcom that was out in the 90s and it reminded me of the days I was in school.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nostalgia can be so powerful. Do you miss those school days?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I miss my friends but school was a lot of work.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's understandable, balancing work and friendships can be tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I miss the time we did not have cell phones.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Life was simpler then.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We had to work to solve problems and we had few of them to solve.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those were the days.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: If we were upset after 9 pm we had to deal with it. No texting, posting, or calling your friends house too late!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: So true, we had to be more patient.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I think we had better character and ability to handle our emotions.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That makes a lot of sense.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sometimes you need to be still and quiet about your emotions as they often resolve or ease if you just hold tight.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I miss those days when people could handle their stuff, you know?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Do you think technology makes us better?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It has pros and cons.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What do you think are the cons?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Reduced face-to-face interaction.
